projects.title: TBC Bank - Exchange Rate offer
projects.description: A portal enabling customers to request specific exchange rates, with automated and manual validation across web, mobile, and branch channels.

projects.title: TBC Bank - Rate Engine
projects.description: Build rate engine, to manage exchange, commercial, individual rates.Optimized the performance of it to reliably handle high-volume financial transactions.

projects.title: TBC Bank - Jira API Automation Tool
projects.description: A tool to auto-create and track Jira tasks, improving project management efficiency across departments.

projects.title: TBC Bank - Company Libraries
projects.description: Contributed to reusable internal libraries, including the implementation of a RabbitMQ idempotency checker and common templates, improving standardization and efficiency across multiple projects.
